text: 5:5 Jenesis 49:9; Aisaia 11:1; 11:10; Rom 15:12; Hibru 7:14; Akar Mogomem 6:1; 22:16Ezɨ gumazir dapanibar mav kamaghɨn na mɨgei, “Nɨ arangan markɨ. Nɨ orakigh. Laionɨn kam Judan adarazir atrivimɨn oto, atrivir bar ekiam, an Atrivim Devitɨn ovavim, egha a mɨdorozim gamua uan apanim abɨragha gɨfa. Kamagh amizɨ, me akɨnafarimɨn 7plan kandelɨn, grisɨn mɨghɨnɨziba adegh, akɨnafarir kam onegham.”
